snippet: U.S. stocks ended higher on Friday, with both the Dow and S&P 500 closing at records in a broad rally, though trading was light with many market participants still out for the Christmas holiday....

headline.print_headline: Wall Street Ends at Record in Second Straight Weekly Gain
headline.main: Wall Street Ends at Record in Second Straight Weekly Gain

lead_paragraph: U.S. stocks ended higher on Friday, with both the Dow and S&P 500 closing at records in a broad rally, though trading was light with many market participants still out for the Christmas holiday.
